Package com.chrisgalhur.dice_game.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.chrisgalhur.dice_game.controller.GameController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/game") public class GameController extends Object
Controller class for handling the game endpoints. This class is responsible for handling the incoming requests for the game. - POST /play: Play the game. - PUT /update: Update the player name. - DELETE /deleteHistory: Delete the player history. - GET /getHistoryPlayer: Get the player history.

    • play

      @ExceptionHandler(InvalidPlayerException.class) @PostMapping("/play") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GameResponse> play(@RequestBody PlayerDTO playerDTO)
      Method to play the game. This method handles POST requests to play the game and returns the game response. - Play the game. - Return the game response.
      Parameters:
      playerDTO - The player DTO containing a player name.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The game response.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - To handle the invalid player exception.
